issue.title: [C++] Implement experimental buffer compression in IPC messages
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7979](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7979). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The idea is that this can be used for experiments and bespoke applications (e.g. in the context of ARROW-5510). If this is adopted formally into the IPC format then the experimental implementation can be altered to match the specification
